title: Vaama Duraiyamma song lyrics -Madharasapattinam
stanzas:
Singers: Udit Narayan, 
Voice:    VMC Haneefa, Amy Jackson

Vaama Duraiyamma
---hmmmm? .. Common White lady
Idhu vangak kariyamma...
---What?. Padraram singing..

Vaama Duraiyamma
Idhu vangak kariyamma...
Vanakam sollithan varaverkum ooramma
--- we welcome with vanakam
--- Ohhh vanakkam
Kattavandiyilum povom, tromil eriyum povom
Koovam padagilum povom, polamaaa....
Magudi oodhida paambu aadudhey yamma ..
--Snake Dance
Yaanai thumbikai aasirvadhangal yamma ..
--Elephant hands
Odiya dhiyam ingae yammamma...
-- WOW

Vaama Duraiyamma ....

Ohhhh pavai koothukal bommalatangal
kovil sirpathil kalai vazharpom
Dhinam vaasal kolathil arisi maviley
Pravaikum erumbukum viruindhu vaipom
-- Whats this?
-- Food for koruvi's
-- Oh really
-- yes
Kodi jadhigal ingae ullapodhilum
Annan thambiyaai nangal vazhvom
-- all are brothers and sisters but parents different
-- great
-- thank  you thank you
Veetil thinnaigal kattuvom yamma...
Vazhipokan vandhudhan thoongi selluvan summa...
Thayum deivamthan ingae yammammaa...
--Lovely

Vaama Duraiyamma ....

Ohh kodi aandugal thandi vazhdhidum
senthamizh engal mozhiyaagum
Ada kamban valluvan kavidhaiyil sonna
Vazhkai engal neriyaagum..
-- Who is that?
-- adhu yaarunnu sonna puriyava pogudhu, old poets written gold lines
Indha bumiyil neengal engum pogalam
Ingu mattume anbai kanalam
-- I Love You
-- I beg your pardon
-- No No land of love, thapichonda sami
Veera mannargal vazhdha nadidhu yamma..
Idhai adimaiyaakithan kodumai seivadhu niyayama....
-- yeah summa irappa enpolappa keduthiradha
Valyil mazhayum than vizhudhadhu yammamma ..
-- ammamma

Vaama Duraiyamma ....
--
